entries.waypoint_desc_1: Contact the Imperial Informant at these coordinates and find out what has been found out about Skimmer.
entries.waypoint_return_desc_1: Return to the Imperial Coordinator and report your findings.
entries.m1_init_failure: It appears your contact is no longer at this location.
entries.waypoint_failure: Your datapad is unable to hold more information. Talk to me after you've cleaned out that useless data you are carrying and I'll download the information then.
entries.m1_data_disk_received: You have been given a data disk.
entries.m1_data_disk_denied: You were unable to receive the data disk because your inventory is full. You need to make space available.
entries.decoded_data_disk: Using the old Imperial Decoder you were able to decode the Dead Eye message.
entries.decode_failed: You do not have the required decoder to decode this message.
entries.waypoint_desc_3: Stop the Rebel Slicer and intercept the encoded message.
entries.waypoint_return_desc_3: Return to the Imperial Coordinator with the encoded message.
entries.m3_init_failure: It appears the slicer is no longer at these coordinates.
entries.waypoint_desc_4: Deliver the encoded message to the Imperial Commander.
entries.waypoint_desc_5: Locate the Drall Camp and make an example of them for other Rebel dissidents.
entries.m5_init_failure: The Drall must have moved their camp, they are no longer at these coordinates.
entries.mission_complete: CONGRATULATIONS!!  You have completed the Vacca's Allegience Event.
